blocks.content:
Congratulations on completing this journey! Job well done!

We hope you've enjoyed traveling with us as you:

- Learned about the value of monitoring GitHub repositories through observability platforms
- Learned about the advantages of using the GitHub data source plugin in Grafana
- Created a GitHub Personal Access Token with appropriate permissions
- Successfully installed and configured the GitHub data source plugin

**Related paths**

Consider taking the following paths after you complete this journey:

- [Visualize GitHub data source in Grafana Cloud](/docs/learning-paths/github-visualize/)
